stories.title: From Overwhelmed to Empowered
stories.story: AI drafts emails, summarizes reports, and organizes data in seconds. Your team focuses on what truly matters.
stories.highlight: 3-5 hours saved weekly per team member

stories.title: Faster Coding with AI Assistance
stories.story: AI helps debug code, suggests optimizations, and generates documentation. Developers ship features faster with fewer errors.

stories.title: Teams Working Smarter Together
stories.story: AI generates ideas, creates presentations, and solves problems faster. Everyone contributes more effectively.
stories.highlight: Shared skills that elevate the entire team

stories.title: More Imaginative Solutions
stories.story: AI generates alternative approaches, explores new angles, and challenges assumptions. Teams break through creative blocks.
stories.highlight: Unlock 10x more ideas in brainstorming sessions

stories.title: Confidence in Every Task
stories.story: AI handles repetitive tasks like formatting and extracting information. Your team works faster with less stress.
stories.highlight: Skills that boost morale and productivity

stories.title: Data Insights in Minutes, Not Days
stories.story: AI analyzes spreadsheets, identifies patterns, and creates visualizations instantly. Make data-driven decisions faster.
stories.highlight: Transform complex data into actionable insights

stories.title: Celebrating Wins Together
stories.story: AI accelerates projects and improves output quality. Your team delivers better results and meets deadlines easier.

investments.description: Microsoft invested heavily in OpenAI, integrating AI capabilities across Office 365, Azure cloud services, and enterprise solutions, making AI tools accessible to millions of businesses worldwide.
Google's massive investment in AI infrastructure powers Gemini, Bard, and enterprise AI solutions, transforming how businesses leverage data and automation at scale.
Amazon's investment in Anthropic and AWS AI services brings advanced language models and machine learning tools to businesses of all sizes through cloud infrastructure.
Meta's commitment to open-source AI through LLaMA and extensive R&D investments are democratizing access to powerful AI models for developers and businesses globally.

courseModules.title: AI Basics for Busy Teams
courseModules.description: Understand what AI can and cannot do at work. Learn where AI adds real value, where it doesn't, and experience your first hands-on interaction with AI in a safe, guided way.

courseModules.title: Prompting That Actually Works
courseModules.description: Learn how to communicate with AI clearly and effectively. Participants are guided step-by-step through simple prompt structures to get better, more useful outputs.
courseModules.highlight: Master the art of AI conversation

courseModules.title: AI for Everyday Work
courseModules.description: Apply AI to common workplace tasks such as emails, reports, summaries, research, and planning through group-based activities focused on real work scenarios.
courseModules.highlight: Use AI for real tasks immediately

courseModules.title: The "Role-Based Deep Dives" with AI (Specialist Tracks)
courseModules.description: Explore practical AI use cases for different teams including Marketing, Operations, HR, IT, and Sales. Learn how AI supports each role without replacing human judgement.

courseModules.title: Safe and Responsible AI at Work
courseModules.description: Understand common AI risks such as data privacy, hallucinations, and over-reliance. Learn how to use AI responsibly through demonstrations using simulated data.

courseModules.title: Final AI Challenge: End-to-End Simulation
courseModules.description: Teams take on realistic departmental scenarios and use AI tools end-to-end to solve problems, improve outputs, and present results based on everything learned during the course.

faqs.question: Do I need any technical background or coding experience?
faqs.answer: Not at all! This course is specifically designed for non-technical professionals. We start from the basics and focus on practical applications you can use immediately in your daily work, regardless of your technical expertise.

faqs.question: How is this different from free online AI courses?
faqs.answer: Unlike generic online courses, this training is hands-on, interactive, and tailored for Malaysian workplace contexts. You'll work on real scenarios relevant to your industry, get immediate feedback from expert instructors, and network with peers facing similar challenges.

faqs.question: Will AI replace my job or my team's jobs?
faqs.answer: AI is a tool that augments human capabilities, not replaces them. This course teaches you how to use AI to eliminate repetitive tasks so you can focus on creative, strategic, and relationship-driven work that only humans can do well.

faqs.question: Is this course suitable for small businesses and SMEs?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! The course is specifically designed with SMEs and small teams in mind. All examples and use cases are practical and immediately applicable without requiring large budgets or IT departments.

faqs.question: How quickly can my team see results after the training?
faqs.answer: Most teams start seeing productivity gains within the first week. You'll leave the course with ready-to-use prompts, templates, and workflows that you can implement immediately in your daily operations.
